description: This vegan kale salad recipe features sauteed Mung Bean Sprouts and Seared Carrots all tossed in a sweet and spicy Chili Lime Dressing! A perfect healthy side dish or lunch! Allergen Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, gluten, grain, yeast, nut.Allergen Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, gluten, grain, yeast, nut
keywords: kale salad recipe, mung bean sprouts salad, sprouted bean salad
name: Kale Salad Recipe with Mung Bean Sprouts, Seared Carrots & Chili Lime Sesame Dressing
recipeIngredient: a generous dash of cayenne pepper or red chili powder
a generous dash of lime zest
Chili Lime Sesame dressing to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything listed under dressing. Taste and adjust salt, sweet and spice. Let sit for 15 minutes if possible or so for the flavors to all gel together.
